name: Extinction (itch) (Fireskelet, Avishay21, Miguel Gessaghi)
description:
Action Shooter for Genre Mash Jam.

You play as Blob who found himself in a deserted planet with zombies and has to defend himself with his genetically infused cannon, unfortunately you are low on ammo, so you will have to REUSE every bullet you shoot, the gun isn't very sturdy so pick up scrap from ground to repair your cannon.

Controls:

  • LEFT CLICK - Shoot
  •  E - Pick up bullets, scrap and hearts
  • Q - Repair your cannon

Some zombies drop hearts pick them up to regain health.

Thanks for playing!

P.S. I dont know if the MAC version works, sory for teasing if it doesnt :D
